remarks: If signed area is zero, the signed area with swapped arguments is also zero.  Deduction version.  ( Contributed by Saveliy Skresanov, 23-Sep-2017.)  (Contributed by Saveliy Skresanov, 24-Sep-2017.)
statement:
sigarimcd.sigar $e |- G = ( x e. CC , y e. CC |-> ( Im ` ( ( * ` x ) x. y ) ) ) $.
sigarimcd.a $e |- ( ph -> ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) ) $.
sigariz.a $e |- ( ph -> ( A G B ) = 0 ) $.
sigariz $p |- ( ph -> ( B G A ) = 0 ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
